name: Nathaniel Cho
text:
[reaction] When you deal damage to an enemy by an event or a fight ability on an event: Deal 1 additional damage. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If this skill test is successful during an attack, return an event from your discard pile to your hand.
back_flavor: When up-and-coming boxer Nathaniel Cho was offered lots of dough for a title fight, he thought he'd finally hit the big time. But his promoter turned out to be part of the notorious O'Bannion gang, and Nathaniel was pressured to fix fights by taking a dive every now and then. His refusal led to his brother Randall's "accident." Nathaniel is rightly fed up with the mobsters endangering Arkham's citizens on a nightly basis. Now he puts his fists to better use, patrolling the streets and defending others from harm. But he's about to find out there are much more dangerous things that lurk in the shadows of Arkham than simple gangsters...
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Randall Cho, Tommy Malloy, 1 random basic weakness.

flavor: "You gotta give this up, Nathaniel. Sooner or later, you're gonna get yourself killed."
name: Randall Cho
text: Nathaniel Cho deck only. [reaction] After Randall Cho enters play: Heal 3 damage or search your deck and discard pile for a [[Weapon]] asset, play it (paying its cost), and shuffle your deck.

flavor:
They call him "The Big Palooka."
Nathaniel calls him scum.
name: Tommy Malloy
text: Prey - Nathaniel Cho only. Hunter. Forced - When Tommy Malloy would take any amount of damage: Reduce that amount to 1.

name: Self-Destructive
text: Revelation - Put Self-Destructive into play in your threat area. Forced - When you deal 1 or more damage to an enemy: Take 1 damage. [action] [action]: Discard Self-Destructive.

name: Boxing Gloves
text:
You get +1 [combat] while fighting.
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Boxing Gloves: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for a [[Spirit]] event and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Flesh Ward
text:
Uses (4 charges).
[reaction] When you are dealt damage and/or horror from an enemy attack, exhaust Flesh Ward and spend 1 charge: Cancel 1 damage or horror just dealt from that attack.

flavor: "With Iron and Salt. With Water and Fire."
name: Grete Wagner
text:
You get +1 [combat].
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Grete Wagner and deal 1 damage to her: Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Relentless
text:
[reaction] When you deal excess damage to an enemy, exhaust Relentless: Place that excess damage on Relentless.
[fast] Discard Relentless: Gain resources equal to the amount of damage on it.

flavor: Keep an eye out for any trouble, she told me. I rolled my eyes. There was always trouble.
name: Safeguard
text: [reaction] After another investigator moves from your location to a connecting location, exhaust Safeguard: Move to that location.

name: Clean Them Out
text: Fight. When this action begins, gain 2 resources.

name: Counterpunch
text: Fast. Play after an enemy attacks you, even if that attack was canceled. Fight. This attack targets the attacking enemy.

name: "Get over here!"
text: Engage. Fight. Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location or a connecting location. Move that enemy to your location, engage it, and attack it.

name: Glory
text:
Fast. Play after you defeat an enemy.
Draw 2 cards.

name: Monster Slayer
text: Fight. This attack deals +1 damage.

flavor: Nathaniel is renowned for his rapid left jab and right cross signature move.
name: One-Two Punch
text: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed, you may fight that enemy again. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for that attack.

flavor: They won't take us down that easily!
name: Stand Together
text: Choose another investigator at your location. Both you and that investigator gain 2 resources.

name: Evidence!
text:
Fast. Play after you defeat an enemy.
Discover 1 clue at your location (2 clues instead if you defeated enemies with a combined total of at least 4 printed health this turn).

name: Galvanize
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Ready a [guardian] asset you control. You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to fight.

name: Counterpunch
text: Fast. Play when an enemy attacks you (before resolving that attack). Fight. This attack targets the attacking enemy. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: "Get over here!"
text: Fast. Play during any [free] window. Engage. Fight. Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy up to 2 locations away. Move that enemy to your location, engage it, and attack it.

name: Lesson Learned
text:
Fast. Play after you take damage from an enemy attack.
Discover 2 clues at your location.

name: Mano a Mano
text:
Play only as your first action.
Deal 2 damage to an enemy engaged with you. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Overpower
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card (2 cards instead if it succeeds by 2 or more).

name: Boxing Gloves
text:
You get +2 [combat] while fighting.
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Boxing Gloves: Search the top 9 cards of your deck for a [[Spirit]] event and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "With Iron and Salt. With Water and Fire."
name: Grete Wagner
text:
You get +1 [combat] and +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Grete Wagner and deal 1 damage to her: Discover 1 clue at your location or a connecting location.

name: Dynamite Blast
text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Choose either your location or a connecting location. Deal 3 damage to each enemy and investigator at the chosen location.

flavor: You steel your nerves and shout into the darkness. "Come and get me!"
name: Taunt
text:
Fast. Play during any [fast] window.
Engage any number of enemies at your location. For each enemy engaged this way, deal it 1 damage and draw 1 card.

name: Physical Training
text:
Uses (2 resources). Replenish these resources at the start of each round.
[free] Spend 1 resource from your resource pool or from Physical Training: You get +1 [willpower] or +1 [combat] for this skill test.

flavor: Nathaniel is renowned for his rapid left jab and right cross signature move.
name: One-Two Punch
text: Fight. You automatically succeed and deal +1 damage for this attack. You may fight again. You get +3 [combat] and deal +2 damage for that attack.
